list.abs: 狱中记（DE PROFUNDIS啦）。王尔德著，孙宜学译。
《从深处》(De profundis)本为拉丁文本《圣经》第129首诗篇歌，为7首忏悔诗篇歌之一。原配有单声素歌旋律，供罗马天主教堂举行 …

auth_sentence.content: You can write De Profundis,' like Oscar Wilde.
auth_sentence.res_content: You can write De Profundis,' like Oscar Wilde.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You can write De Profundis,' like Oscar Wilde.

auth_sentence.content: While in prison he composed a long letter to Douglas, posthumously published under the title 'De Profundis' .
auth_sentence.res_content: While in prison he composed a long letter to Douglas, posthumously published under the title 'De Profundis' .
auth_sentence.res_content_con: While in prison he composed a long letter to Douglas, posthumously published under the title 'De Profundis' .
